issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: Remove the shaded ActiveMQ web console

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: ActiveMQ web console not installable after upgrade to 5.9.1

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: OSGi/Karaf
components.description: activemq-osgi / karaf and anyhow OSGi related

fields.description:
Steps to reprodouce: 

1. start Karaf 2.3.5 or 3.0.1. 
2. install activemq feature : 
feature:repo-add activemq 5.9.1 
feature:install activemq-broker

fields.summary: ActiveMQ web-console fails to start in Karaf - missing import

comments.body:
After correcting this error another exception has been thrown when creating a new queue in the web console

{code}

GitHub user sobkowiak opened a pull request:

    https://github.com/apache/activemq/pull/25

    AMQ-5167 ActiveMQ web-cosole fails to start in Karaf - missing import

    

You can merge this pull request into a Git repository by running:

    $ git pull https://github.com/sobkowiak/activemq activemq-5.9

Alternatively you can review and apply these changes as the patch at:

    https://github.com/apache/activemq/pull/25.patch

To close this pull request, make a commit to your master/trunk branch
with (at least) the following in the commit message:

    This closes #25

Please apply the pull request https://github.com/apache/activemq/pull/25 for {{activemq-5.9.x}} and https://github.com/apache/activemq/pull/27 for {{trunk}}. https://github.com/apache/activemq/pull/26 is no more valid and I have closed it.
Will you not release the 5.9.x line anymore?
I don't have any plans to do it. If someone wants to do it, he can apply the patch to that branch before the release.

Github user sobkowiak closed the pull request at:

    https://github.com/apache/activemq/pull/27
I merge on 5.9.x branch just in case.
